content: **please link to individual patterns rather than to this entry whenever possible** **summary** this is a fund-raising pattern little hats fitting the tops of innocent drinks bottles are knitted and sent in each hat is placed on a bottle of innocent smoothie and for each one sold 50p goes to age concern three patterns are available beginner single color intermediate stripes and advanced with leaf and stem direct pdf download innocent hats 1 optional notions google eyes pom pattern **no longer available** at the rowan website 1 http //www ageuk org uk/get-involved/volunteer/get-knitting-for-the-big-knit/big-knit-knitting-patterns/
